name: changeGamestate
description: string = gamestaten nimi, mixed = arvo, bool = increment(default false)

name: fade
description: float 0-1, opacity to fade to (1 = black screen), seconds = float, 0 = instant change (default 1 second), color, hexadecimal value as a string of 6 characters (default black).

name: launchDialogue
description: int = dialogin id

name: showAsset
description: string = assetin nimi, bool = vapaaehtoinen, truella ei enabloida inputtia jos sellainen on

name: hideAsset
description: string = assetin nimi

name: modifyAsset
description: string1 = assetin nimi, string2 = assetin property, mixed = propertyyn asetettava value

name: playAnimation
description: assetin nimi, string2 = animaation nimi

name: playFx
description: string = efektin nimi

name: wait
description: int = odotettava aika sekunteina

name: moveAssetTo
description: x = int, y = int, name = string, velocity = int, pixels per second

name: moveCharacterTo
description: int = x value where to move, bool = don't move follower automatically after the character

name: changeQuestLog
description: string = machineName, name of quest, string = operation, hide/show/complete/incomplete/hidePart/showPart, int = textIndex, only in hidePart/showPart

name: modifyNpc
description: string1 = npcName, string2 = operation, mixed = value, available operations: getIn (value = door where to appear), getOut (value = door where to walk to and disappear), startFollowing (no value), stopFollowing (no value), hide (no value), show (no value), showPart (value = body part to display), hidePart (value = body part to hide), attachToRoom (value = room to attach to), detachFromRoom (value = Room to detach from), changeY (value = new Y value), toggleForeground (Switch npc foreground/background value), changeWalkAnimation (value = New animation name), changeIdleAnimation (value = New animation name)

name: moveNpcTo
description: npcName, target (can be 'character', name of asset or x coordinate), targetY, velocity

name: modifyDoor
description: string1 = doorName, bool = doorState(ovi auki/kiinni)

name: sendMessage
description: string = chatId (format like 'chatMessages0', 'chatMessages1', 'chatEmail0', 'chatForum0' etc.), int = dialogueId (the message/question/chat which starts the next time the user goes to the wallet)

name: teleport
description: string = huoneen nimi, int = OPTIONAL spawnX

name: addToInventory
description: string = assetin nimi

name: removeFromInventory
description: string = assetin nimi

name: incomingPhoneCall
description: int = dialogue id, string = callers machineName

name: flipNpc
description: string = npcName, string = target, can be 'left', 'right', 'character' or an x coordinate

name: addPlayerName
description: string1 = textId, name of string to use when deleting it; string2 = roomId, where to add the player name to; int1 = x coordinate; int2 = y coordinate; int3 = fontsize; string4 = OPTIONAL font name (default opendyslexicregular), string3 = OPTIONAL color of text (default FFFFFF), int4 = X anchor (default 0), int5 = Y anchor (default 0).

name: removePlayerName
description: string = textId, the one that was defined when creating the player name with addPlayerName.

name: displayQuestText
description: string1 = quest id (defined in Game.js object), int = textIndex

name: displayQuestCompleted
description: string1 = quest id (defined in Game.js object)

name: displayInfoBox
description: string1 = imagePrefix ('liikkuminen', 'rahat', 'ovet', 'apua', 'reppu', 'asetukset', 'keskustelut', 'tehtävät')

name: scalePlayer
description: float1 = scale value 0.0 - 1.0

name: changeGuiVisibility
description: bool = visible, int = (OPTIONAL) tweening duration, default is instant show/hide

name: changeFollowerOffset
description: int = dialogin id

name: changeMusic
description: string = musicId to change to, boolean1 = make music last across rooms and override room defaults, boolean2 = OPTIONAL override for loop parameter, int = OPTIONAL fadeTime in milliseconds

name: resetGame
description: boolean1 = toMainMenu, if false will just restart the game, boolean2 = true if you want to empty the localstorage

name: changeRandomAnim
description: Experimental thing

name: rohkaisija
description: Experimental thing

name: putRandomValueToGamestate
description: Gamestate randomizer (gamestate, min, max)
